channel.title: About pvp..?
channel.description: Hey! I'd like to make a button to my server.. Where usually is Auto retaliate, there would be Pvp on and off. When it is on you could fight anyone who have it on! But if you have on and somebody else havent you may not fight. So is this possible?

item.title: About pvp..?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It is possible, but you would have to add many methods.

Read full topic
